item.title: SendKeysVB not working
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

You could try something like this:

[php]procedure SpawnMobs;
begin
AddToReport(‘Walking around to find monsters’);
temp := 0;
repeat
KeyDown(VK_UP);
KeyDown(VK_LEFT);
Wait(1000);
KeyUp(VK_UP);
KeyUp(VK_Left);
Wait(50);
temp := temp + 1;
until(temp = 10);
temp := 0;
repeat
KeyDown(VK_DOWN);
KeyDown(VK_RIGHT);
Wait(1000);
KeyUp(VK_DOWN);
KeyUp(VK_RIGHT);
Wait(50);
temp := temp + 1;
until(temp = 10);
end;[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: SendKeysVB not working
item.dc:creator: @rhijaen rhijaen
item.description:
@rhijaen wrote:

I am working on a script for a different game

I need the script to be able to walk diagonally in the game. this can be done by either holding down arrowright and arrowdown or pressing pgdown. arrowup arrowleft or home key is the other one

the code is supposed to hit the home key every second for 10 seconds and then the same for pgdn

The command i am trying to use isn’t working

here is the code: procedure spawnmobs; begin AddToReport ('Walking around to find monsters'); temp:=0; repeat SendKeysVB('{Home}', True); wait(1000); temp:= temp + 1; until(temp=10) temp:=0; repeat SendKeysVB('{PGDN}', True); wait(1000); temp:= temp + 1; until(temp=10)

Read full topic
